listings.title: Cozy studio apartment in the heart of the city
listings.description: This cozy studio apartment is located in the heart of the city, close to major attractions, restaurants, and nightlife. It has a comfortable queen bed, a fully equipped kitchen, a smart TV, and a washer. It also has a balcony with a stunning view of the city skyline. Perfect for solo travelers or couples who want to explore the city.

listings.title: Spacious and modern loft with pool and gym
listings.description: This spacious and modern loft is located in a luxury building with a pool and gym. It has a king bed, a sofa bed, a full kitchen, a smart TV, and a washer. It also has a large window with a beautiful view of the city. Ideal for families or groups who want to enjoy the city in style.
